articles.author: Matt Addison
articles.title: Premier League referee suffers UEFA demotion after Virgil van Dijk's pointed comment - Liverpool.com
articles.description: Liverpool star Virgil van Dijk was unhappy with Anthony Taylor and Stuart Attwell at Euro 2024. Plenty of people have made the same point about Premier League refs.
articles.content: Virgil van Dijk and the Netherlands were left fuming with the decision to rule out what they believed to be a legitimate goal against France at Euro 2024. The Liverpool captain led the protests to on… [+2643 chars]
